newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Dayton Superior started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Dayton Superior started.

text.p: -- Bankers Trust said it initiated coverage of Dayton Superior Corp with a buy rating.
-- Further details were not immediately available.

-- Analyst H. Lloyd Kanev said in a reserach note that Dayton Superior was the top consolidator and largest North American manufacturer in the highly fragmented $450 million concrete and masonry accessories industry.
-- "Organic revenue growth will be augmented by additional acquisitions which could, in turn, improve the company's long-term growth rate," he said.

He said that "With a strong management team, and as one of the the lowest cost producers in the industry, DSD distinguishes itself as a prime candidate for micro-cap value investors in our view. We believe Dayton Superior is undervalued relative to its growth and market."
